properties.name: ratios
properties.description: Array for set up flex ratio between field of record

properties.name: headers
properties.description: Array for indicating the key of columns, and title of columns

subProperty.name: key
subProperty.description: This indicates what values should be shown from the Object array in the column

events.name: pickup
events.description: Emitted when click on record, will emit current record data or identifier data with index on current page.
